Returns the parameters the distribution was constructed with.

@1@ Returns the {{math|a}} parameter. It defines the shape of the distribution. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

@2@ Returns the {{math|b}} parameter. It defines the scale of the distribution. The default value is {{c|1.0}}. 

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ The value of the {{math|a}} parameter.

@2@ The value of the {{math|b}} parameter.

===Complexity===
Constant.
